about_the_game:
The clock is ticking, and there’s only Five Minutes Till Christmas! Step into the holiday frenzy as you race through the bustling halls of the local shopping mall, dashing to fulfill every last gift request. The stakes are high—everyone’s Christmas joy rests in your hands, and there’s no time to waste!

But it won’t be easy. Security guards are on high alert, keeping an eye out for anyone moving a little too fast or getting a little too creative with their shortcuts. Every gift you grab boosts your score, but getting caught could mean missing out on the perfect Christmas for everyone on your list. You’ll need speed, wits, and a keen sense of strategy to avoid detection and make it out in time.

When the five minutes are up, your performance will be scored, showing just how well you spread the holiday cheer. And with global leaderboards, you can compare your skills against others, proving who really has what it takes to make it a merry Christmas. Are you ready to beat the clock and save the holiday season?

The clock is ticking, and there’s only Five Minutes Till Christmas! Step into the holiday frenzy as you race through the bustling halls of the local shopping mall, dashing to fulfill every last gift request. The stakes are high—everyone’s Christmas joy rests in your hands, and there’s no time to waste!

But it won’t be easy. Security guards are on high alert, keeping an eye out for anyone moving a little too fast or getting a little too creative with their shortcuts. Every gift you grab boosts your score, but getting caught could mean missing out on the perfect Christmas for everyone on your list. You’ll need speed, wits, and a keen sense of strategy to avoid detection and make it out in time.

When the five minutes are up, your performance will be scored, showing just how well you spread the holiday cheer. And with global leaderboards, you can compare your skills against others, proving who really has what it takes to make it a merry Christmas. Are you ready to beat the clock and save the holiday season?

name: Five Minutes Till Christmas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970M or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070M or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Race against the clock in Five Minutes Till Christmas, a fast-paced holiday arcade game! Sprint through a bustling mall to gather last-minute gifts, evade vigilant security guards, and complete as many whishes before the time runs out. Perfect your strategy to top the global leaderboards!
